description:
Frame the special moment in your life!

FrameUrLife helps you combine multiple photos into frames, With 48 fully adjustable frames, rounded corners, photo effects, plenty of beautiful frames and an easy color picker, can frame all the special moments in your life and share them with your friends and family.

USER REVIEWS

Looked everywhere for frames this is perfect!

It's the most awesome App ever!!! I can't believe it. It is free!

I love this app, a lot of different frames to work with to make your pictures look even more fantastic. Must have app.

I want to edit all my pics with this!

You can not get a better app to frame your pictures it is the best app I have come across in the app store. It's free so why not give it a try.

This is the best app ever I am going to tell all my friends


MAIN FEATURES
- Add texts very easily and quickly
- Change the text color, size, and font
- Resize, rotate and move the text
- > 80 fonts
- 48 layouts (resize each frame area for endless customization)
- Rounded corners on photos
- Change the border width
- Shadow for each frame
- 30 frames for customization
- Apply effects to individual photos
- Easy color picker for the frames background
- Square format and 3:2, 2:3, 4:3, 2:1 ratios
- Zoom, pan, rotate or mirror each photo
- Share images via Facebook, Twitter, Flickr, Email
－Automatically save your collages for further editing
trackCensoredName: FrameUrLife Pro - Picture Frames + Photo collage
trackName: FrameUrLife Pro - Picture Frames + Photo collage
